Package org.jgrapes.io

Class NioDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentVertex
      • org.jgrapes.core.Component
        • org.jgrapes.io.NioDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<ComponentType>, Runnable, Channel, ComponentType, Eligible, Manager
    public class NioDispatcher
extends Component
implements Runnable
    A helper component that provides the central hub for non blocking I/O components.

    Exactly one NioDispatcher must exist in any tree with NioHandler components.

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        @Handler
public void onStart​(Start event)
        Starts this dispatcher.

        A dispatcher has an associated thread that keeps it running.

        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • onStop

        @Handler(priority=-10000)
public void onStop​(Stop event)
            throws InterruptedException
        Stops the thread that is associated with this dispatcher.
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the execution is interrupted

      • run

        public void run()
        Invoked once by the thread associated with the dispatcher.

        Handles all events from the underlying Selector.
